24-48 HOUR TURN TIME

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.18.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

You heard it right. Typical turn time for a title commitment is 24-48 hours. We can also have an appraisal turned around that fast if you need it!
